entry.title: KeeVeeGames/OKColor.gml
entry.summary: An okay color management for GameMaker implementing OKLab/OKLCH colors. Generate, convert, gamut map and mix colors properly with visually better results. Also supports RGB, HSV, HSL, Lab, LCH, and other models.
